name: Late to the Forest
description:
Made in 3 hours (2 hours, 48 minutes) for Trijam #124: The 3 hour game Jam with the theme: Dead Last. 

Play as Auburn as he realizes that he forgot his alarm clock and is late to hang out with his friends in the forest. Hopefully he isn't too late!

Controls Keyboard 

Arrow keys -  Movement

Z - Select

X- Menu / Cancel

Mouse

Left click - move to point/select

Right click - Menu/ Cancel

Touchscreen

1 finger- move to point/select

2 finger tap - Menu/ Cancel

Credits

Game  Engine and RTP Assets (Sprites, Tilesets, Sound Effects, Music) - RPG Maker MV

Menu Plugin - Mjshi

Credits Plugin - SumRndmDde

Text Sound Effects - Galv
